article_title: Amazon extends return window amid coronavirus pandemic
article_description: Amazon is temporarily extending its return policy window to help its customers during the coronavirus crisis  If you live in the US or Canada  you now have until May 31st to return any products you buy between now and April 30th through Amazon or one of the c
